high_descs: Walk straight to the desk.
Pick up the pen that is next to the cup.
Go closer to the desk.
Put the pen in the clear bowl that is on the desk.
Pick up the clear bowl with the pen inside of it.
Turn left, walk to the wall, turn right towards the desk.
Place the bowl next to the cup on the top shelf of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Place the bowl with the pen in it onto the top shelf of the desk.

high_descs: Look at the dresser in front of you.
Pick up the pen between the lap top and the mug.
Hold the pen in front of you.
Put the pen into the bowl behind the mug.
Pick up the bowl with the pen.
Go to the left.
Put the bowl with the pen on the shelf above the lap top to the right of the mug.
anns.task_desc: Put a pen in a bowl on the shelf above the lap top.

high_descs: Move forward to the desk.
Pick up the pen on the desk.
Move closer to the desk.
Put the pen in the bowl on the desk.
Pick up the bowl from the desk.
Bring the bowl over to the computer on the desk.
Put the bowl next to the white mug.
anns.task_desc: Put a bowl with a pen in it on the top shelf of the desk.
